title: pairing sessions
extract: Your First Pairing SessionTry it with someone nice. Ideally, your first session will take place with an experienced pair. ... Do it when you're fresh. ... Get the ergonomics right. ... Pick an easy task. ... Maybe don't call it pairing. ... Try mobbing. ... Timebox it. ... Wait to draw conclusions.More items...
extract_html:
Your First Pairing Session
  1. Try it with someone nice. Ideally, your first session will take place with an experienced pair. ...
  2. Do it when you're fresh. ...
  3. Get the ergonomics right. ...
  4. Pick an easy task. ...
  5. Maybe don't call it pairing. ...
  6. Try mobbing. ...
  7. Timebox it. ...
  8. Wait to draw conclusions.
More items...
